import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function OffersTable(){const[offers,setOffers]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{fetchOffers().then(data=>{setOffers(data);setLoading(false);}).catch(err=>{console.error(err);setLoading(false);});},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading",children:"Loading offers..."});if(!offers.length)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading",children:"No offers found."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"table-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"offers-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Store"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Cashback (%)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Link"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Scraped At"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:offers.map((offer,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:offer.store}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:offer.cashback}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:offer.link,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"visit-btn",children:"Visit"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:new Date(offer.scraped_at).toLocaleString()})]},idx))})]})});}export default OffersTable;
